page.title: 04MORETON CofE (AIDED) SCHOOL
page.content: The Headmaster is Mr.G.R.Mack. There are 3 other teachers; Miss.J.Westley,Mrs.J.Perry and Mrs.M.Smith. The caretaker is Mrs.M.Reynolds. In the school there are 70 children split into three classes. The children come from Bobbingworth, Moreton, Toothill, Magdalen Laver and Stanford Rivers.28 children come to school by coach, 27 come by car, 14 walk and 2 cycle. There are 3 classrooms, a library, a hall, which is used for P.E.,assembly, dining, and drama, 2 offices, and the original 19th.Century school rooms, which houses the television. A new group room is being built. There are cloak rooms and toilets for boys and girls.
